Search properties from your favorite realtor websites and find the best investment
opportunities.

Credifana is the best automation tool that integrates with popular real estate websites to
provide real time investment analysis to help find quality investment properties.

How it Works
Select from any of the realtor websites that Credifana is integrated with and then search
properties that may interest you. Once you have a property that youâ€™re interested in, open the
extension and Credifana will show details that are specific to that property. Finally, click the
evaluate button to analyze that particular property and watch Credifana give details such as
potential gross income, net profit, and many more property metrics with just a click!
Property Data and Metrics

Credifana pulls property metrics from all across the United States to provide the most accurate
rent prices for any location and any property type! Users get the most up to date property
information in the industry.

Key Features about Credifana Tool
- Credifana gathers data from millions of properties across the United States to provide
accurate prices.
- Property metrics that Credifana provides:
- Potential gross monthly and yearly Income
- Potential monthly and yearly cash flow
- Maintenance, vacancy and management costs for properties
- Monthly and yearly net operator income
- Property history
- Property taxes and insurance cost
- Down payment, mortgage, and closing cost
- Capital needed to purchase property
- Credifana also factors in estimated cost of repair for properties needing
renovating.
- Principal and interest rate for property
- Credifana also analyze capitalization rate and cash on cash return rate.

Property Portfolio
Credifana allows users to maintain a property portfolio of all the properties they searched, so
users are able to pull up previous properties that they have searched in the past and revisit the
data.

Credifana extension works with both (Free and Standard plan), providing opportunities to learn
and analyze properties metrics with a click of a button.

About CREDIFANA
Credifana makes it much easy for real estate investors to find investment opportunities while
exploring their favorite realtor websites. Credifana provides property metrics to help keep
investors ahead of potential opportunities. With Credifana, our goal is to make help make
understanding real estate much easier!
